distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
lhasa was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2016-2347: decode_level3_header heap corruption vulnerability (bsc#973790).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Integer underflow in the decode_level3_header function in lib/lha_file_header.c in Lhasa before 0.3.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted archive.
notes.title: CVE description
